mapper.select: select ndp_subject.subject_id,subject_name,category_name,record_num from ndp_subject,( select subject_id,count(record_id) record_num from ndp_subject_record group by subject_id order by count(record_id) desc limit 5 ) ndp_subject_record,ndp_category where ndp_subject.subject_id = ndp_subject_record.subject_id and ndp_subject.category_id = ndp_category.category_id
